description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Seafood Salad With Rocket, Capsicum & Hazelnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barbecued Seafood Salad With Rocket, Capsicum & Hazelnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40g hazelnuts, toasted, skins removed roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Cook whole capsicums, turning, until the skin blisters and turns black. Transfer to a bowl and cover. Set aside to cool.
Peel skin from capsicum and tear flesh into strips. Arrange rocket and capsicum on a platter.

Meanwhile, remove meat from lobster and cut into 1cm-thick slices. Cut squid into thick strips. 4. Combine seafood in a bowl with 2 tbs of the oil and season. In a jug, combine remaining oil, vinegar, mustard and garlic. Set aside.
Chargrill seafood, turning occasionally, for 2-3 minutes or until just cooked. Pile onto platter, drizzle with dressing and scatter with hazelnut.
